name: Suncore Chronicles: The Tower
description: Suncore Chronicles: The Tower is an action roleplaying game with hack-and-slay elements. Defeat enemies, collect gear and solve riddles with up to three friends in cooperative games via Steam or LAN.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: intel i5 series or adequate Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 500 series or adequate DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: on board Additional Notes: DirectX 11 required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: intel i5 series or adequate Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 900 series or adequate DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: on board Additional Notes: DirectX 11 required
